The zenCSS Color System

Brand palette, light and dark palette, and universal site color system.

bg-primary-dark
bg-primary-light

bg-secondary-dark

bg-grey-6
bg-grey-6-dark
bg-grey-6-light
bg-opaque
bg-blur

Note: bg-opaque triggers a JavaScript function which sets the opacity of all child elements back to 1. bg-blur does this as well, but it can be used in conjunction with other background colors and will blur the background of anything it covers.

The Zen Test

Every part, section, and modifier we ship pass alignment, style, and functional tests to ensure they perform flawlessly in today's modern browsers.

So you can be assured it "just works". Try it out below.
